    Package Description

    pcd.imageviewer  
  • Classes in pcd.imageviewer used by pcd.data 
    Class and Description
    Overlay
    An overlay is a layer on top of an image.
  • Classes in pcd.imageviewer used by pcd.gui 
    Class and Description
    ImageViewer
    A general purpose image viewer component.
  • Classes in pcd.imageviewer used by pcd.gui.base 
    Class and Description
    ImageMouseClickListener
    Interface for receiving mouse click events on an image.
    ImageMouseEvent
    An event indicating that a mouse action occured over an image.
    ImageMouseMotionListener
    Interface for receiving mouse motion events on an image.
  • Classes in pcd.imageviewer used by pcd.gui.dialog 
    Class and Description
    ImageViewer
    A general purpose image viewer component.
  • Classes in pcd.imageviewer used by pcd.imageviewer 
    Class and Description
    ImageComponent
    The component that displays the image itself.
    ImageComponent.MouseEventTranslator
    Helper class that generates ImageMouseEvents by translating normal mouse events onto the image.
    ImageComponent.PaintManager
    Helper class that manages the actual painting.
    ImageComponent.Rescroller 
    ImageMouseClickListener
    Interface for receiving mouse click events on an image.
    ImageMouseEvent
    An event indicating that a mouse action occured over an image.
    ImageMouseMotionListener
    Interface for receiving mouse motion events on an image.
    ImageViewer
    A general purpose image viewer component.
    LayeredImageView
    A component showing an image as well as an arbitrary number of overlays.
    Overlay
    An overlay is a layer on top of an image.
    OverlayComponent
    The JComponent implementing an overlay.
    PixelInfoStatusBar
    A status bar implementation that display information based on a pixel of the image.
    PixelModel
    Stores the x and y coordinate of a pixel.
    ResizeStrategy
    Strategy for resizing an image inside a component.
    StatusBar
    Abstract superclass for status bars of the image viewer.
    Synchronizer
    Manages the synchronization of a collection of viewers.
